title: God pushed me down into the sand at Bible Camp
description:
Shari shares her story. Her story is not linear but complicated. Lots of turns, false starts, pain, struggle and joy. She wanted to give context for her first video. 

#testimony #conversion #christianity

Our first talk https://youtu.be/NYDJjVbG3mk

Talk Notes: 
Context
Book of Revelation quote:  conquered by the blood of the lamb and the word of their testimony and they did not love their lives so as to shy away from death
Sent to Bible camp by her mother, didn’t want to go
Walked to the beach, was thrown to the ground, face in the sand
Felt this heavy weight on her back
Strong sensation of God saying “I love you” 
Trying to crawl in the sand, weight lifted
The love of God was incredibly powerful
Was weeping
Dream of walking in the crowd, angels, 
You’ve got to walk the other way
Bouncers noticed her and then she woke up
John Wimber
Ken blue
Suicide attempt
Brain injury
2 poems

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.io/ @paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/
